name: cmc_scrape_news
description: Scrape the latest cryptocurrency news headlines from CoinMarketCap Academy. Returns article title, source, date, summary, and link for recent crypto news articles.

steps.label: Wait for news articles to load

steps.code: const articles = []; const links = document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/academy/article/"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < links.length; i++) { const link = links[i]; const href = link.href; if (seen.has(href)) continue; seen.add(href); const container = link.closest('article, div, li') || link; const titleEl = container.querySelector('h2, h3, h4') || link.querySelector('h2, h3, h4'); const title = titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : link.textContent.trim(); if (!title || title.length < 5) continue; const dateEl = container.querySelector('time, [datetime]'); const summaryEl = container.querySelector('p'); const imgEl = container.querySelector('img'); articles.push({ title: title, date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', summary: summaryEl ? summaryEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 300) : '', image: imgEl ? (imgEl.src || imgEl.dataset.src || '') : '', url: href }); if (articles.length >= 20) break; } return { article_count: articles.length, articles: articles, url: window.location.href }
